entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 2:17 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:30 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
